sect1.title: BLFS Wiki
sect1.para: The BLFS Project has created a Wiki for users to comment on pages and instructions at . Comments are welcome from all users.

The following are the rules for posting:
Users must register and log in to edit a page.
Suggestions to change the book should be made by creating a new ticket, not by making comments in the Wiki.
Questions with your specific installation problems should be made by subscribing and mailing to the BLFS Support Mailing List at .
Discussions of build instructions should be made by subscribing and mailing to the BLFS Development List at .
Inappropriate material will be removed.
